CREATE WHEEL:
py setup.py sdist bdist_wheel

IF NOT WORKS TRY:
pip install --upgrade wheel

OVERWRITE OLD:
tar + whl:
py setup.py clean --all sdist bdist_wheel
whl only:
py setup.py clean --all bdist_wheel


UPLOAD TO PYPI IN CMD (WINDOWS):
SET API_TOKEN=...
twine check dist/*
twine upload -u __token__ -p %API_TOKEN% dist/* --verbose

OR (IN CMD):
twine check dist/*
SET PATH_TO_PYPIRC=C:\Users\neoking89\.pypirc
twine upload --config-file %PATH_TO_PYPIRC% dist/* --verbose

OR use enviroment variables:
twine check dist/*
SETX TWINE_USERNAME %USERNAME%

twine upload dist/* --verbose
